title: Understanding Percent Style Format
text: To apply the percent style format in Excel, you need to know where to find the option. It's located in the Home tab of the Excel ribbon.

title: Steps to Apply Percent Style
text: First, select the range of cells you want to format. Then, look for the Percent Style button in the Number group under the Home tab.

hintAnswer: select the range to format, and click the percent style button under home tab
title: Select the Correct Option
text: Which of the following steps correctly applies the percent style format?
choices: select the range to format, and click the percent style button under home tab
select the range to format, and click "%"
type "%" in front of each cell
